Query API

Neptune client allows you to fetch data directly form Neptune. This let users make custom analysis of their data.

Project-level

On the level of project you can fetch list of Experiment objects, fetch experiments view as Pandas DataFrame and get all members of the project.

  • get_experiments()

  • get_leaderboard()

  • get_members()

Experiment-level

On the level of Experiment, you can fetch multiple types of tracked objects, ranging from numeric logs values to tags.

  • get_hardware_utilization()

  • get_logs()

  • get_numeric_channels_values()

  • get_parameters()

  • get_properties()

  • get_system_properties()

  • get_tags()
